T.query: select salesorderid, salesorderdetailid from salesorderdetail where orderqty =1 and ( unitprice > 1500 or productid>950);

F.query: select salesorderid, salesorderdetailid from salesorderdetail where orderqty =1 and ( unitprice > 1000 or productid>950)
select salesorderid, salesorderdetailid from salesorderdetail where orderqty =1 and ( unitprice > 1500 or productid=950)
select salesorderid, salesorderdetailid from salesorderdetail where orderqty =1 and ( unitpricediscount > 1500 or productid>950)
select salesorderid, salesorderdetailid from salesorderdetail where (orderqty =1 and unitprice > 1500 ) or orderqty =1
select salesorderid, salesorderdetailid from salesorderdetail where specialofferid =1 and ( unitprice > 1500 or productid>950)
